How does the wordplay work for 17D and 29A? Thanks.

Jack Keynes on 2024-11-06

17D: A (terrible experience) + ‚Üê(too much)‚Üê = A MARE + ‚ÜêOTT "over-the-top" = AMARETTO

29A: ORDURE = (primarily dumped) in (yellow) (river) = D_ inside OR "yellow, in heraldry" URE "river in North Yorkshire"
